trans-unit.source: Represents a right granted to a user to access information in a rights managed document.
As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, ContentGrant is only usable in full trust applications.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"></xref> class that grants a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref>.
This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant> instance with no date or time limitations.
- The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> which indicates there is no starting limitation.
- The <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.ValidUntil%2A> property is set to <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> which indicates there is no ending limitation.
Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an instance with date and time limitations.
The user the access right is granted to.
The access right that is granted.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant"></xref> class that grants a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser"></xref> a specified <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref> for a specified <xref:System.DateTime> duration.
Specify the `validFrom` parameter with <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> if there is no start date and time limitation.
Specify the `validUntil` parameter with <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime> if there is no end date and time limitation.
The user the access right is granted to.
The access right that is granted.
The starting date and time that the right begins.
The ending date and time that the right expires.
Gets the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentRight"></xref> that is granted.
The access right that is granted to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.User*>, as specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Gets the user who is granted the access <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*>.
The user that the access <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> is granted to, as specified to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
Gets the starting date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> begins.

The start date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> begins, or <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> if there is there is no starting limitation.
Gets the ending date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> expires.
The end date and time that the granted <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentGrant.Right*> expires, or <xref:System.DateTime>.<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> if there is no ending limitation.
